Posts.Content: Kimbr7 wrote: I went in for a baseline Mammogram with only family history of my great-grandma having breast cancer.  After two mammograms and a sonogram, I have a Breast biopsy scheduled for tomorrow and an appointment to go over biopsy resluts the day after Thanksgiving.  Radiologist says she thinks it might be a Radial Scar, but can't be sure what we are dealing with.  Does anyone know anything about this? I am so scared...I am only 35 years old and have two little girls....just never thought I would have to deal with this so soon.  I just went in because my company was paying for it and it was free...I mean why not right?  I guess I'm glad I did.  Has anyone this age deal with this?  My head is pounding fro crying and just don't know where to go from here...I am so nervous and scared. Thanks in advance....Kim Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Possibly Radial Scar or cancer with Needle Biospy tomorrow Kimbr7 BLinthedesert

Posts.Content: Nov 20, 2012 01:30PM Kimbr7 wrote: Thanks so much!  I keep trying to convince myself everything is okay....and hoping it is.  The waiting part is thw worst.  I shoudl have results by Friday.  Regardless...Doctor said it needs removed.  Did you have yours removed?
Posts.Title: Possibly Radial Scar or cancer with Needle Biospy tomorrow Kimbr7 BLinthedesert

Posts.Content: Nov 21, 2012 08:47AM Kimbr7 wrote: Thanks so much for all the kind words and thoughts.  I am getting ready to leave for by biopsy.  Scared but ready to move forward and finally get resolution to what is going on inside my body.
Posts.Title: Possibly Radial Scar or cancer with Needle Biospy tomorrow Kimbr7 BLinthedesert

Posts.Content: Nov 23, 2012 07:02PM Kimbr7 wrote: Thanks guys!  My needle biopsy came back negative for cancer today.  Huge relief on my part, but will really feel better once I have the wire guided lumpectomy and get that mess out.  Dr sounded very confident today...she took a ton of tissue and it all came back great. I can't thank you enough for your thoughts and prayers.
